statements: SELECT * FROM MonthlyStatements WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT statement_id, starting_balance, ending_balance FROM MonthlyStatements WHERE statement_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM MonthlyStatements WHERE customer_id = 1005 ORDER BY statement_date DESC;
SELECT statement_id, customer_id, starting_balance FROM MonthlyStatements WHERE ending_balance > 5000;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(items) AS num_of_items FROM MonthlyStatements GROUP BY customer_id HAVING num_of_items > 3;
SELECT * FROM MonthlyStatements WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY statement_date DESC, ending_balance ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT statement_id, statement_date, items[1] FROM MonthlyStatements WHERE starting_balance > 5000 ORDER BY starting_balance DESC
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(statement_id) AS total_statements FROM MonthlyStatements GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_statements DESC
SELECT AVG(ending_balance) AS avg_balance, MAX(ending_balance) AS max_balance, MIN(ending_balance) AS min_balance FROM MonthlyStatements
SELECT * FROM MonthlyStatements WHERE DATE(statement_date) BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30' ORDER BY statement_date
SELECT * FROM monthly_statements;
SELECT customer_id, total_amount, statement_date FROM monthly_statements WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT statement_date, total_amount FROM monthly_statements ORDER BY statement_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, total_amount FROM monthly_statements WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY total_amount ASC;
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM financial_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM monthly_statements ORDER BY statement_date DESC, total_amount ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM monthly_statements GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_spent > 1000 ORDER BY total_spent DESC
SELECT customer_id, AVG(total_amount) AS average_amount FROM monthly_statements WHERE statement_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY average_amount DESC
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS statement_count FROM monthly_statements GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY statement_count DESC

SELECT financial_reports.report_name, financial_reports.report_date, monthly_statements.total_amount FROM financial_reports LEFT JOIN monthly_statements ON financial_reports.id = monthly_statements.customer_id ORDER BY financial_reports.report_date ASC
SELECT * FROM statement ORDER BY statement_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT statement_id, total_amount FROM statement WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM transaction WHERE transaction_type='DEPOSIT' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT activity_id, description, amount FROM account_activity WHERE customer_id=123 ORDER BY activity_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT statement_id, customer_id, statement_date, total_amount FROM statement WHERE customer_id IN (456, 789);
SELECT * FROM statement WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM transaction WHERE transaction_type = 'Purchase' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT statement_id, statement_date, SUM(total_amount) AS total FROM statement GROUP BY statement_id, statement_date;
SELECT MAX(amount) AS max_amount, MIN(amount) AS min_amount FROM transaction;
SELECT customer_id, activity_date, description, amount FROM account_activity WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY activity_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers;
SELECT statement_date, statement_amount FROM monthly_statements WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM financial_reports WHERE report_type = 'Balance Sheet';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 456;
SELECT * FROM financial_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC, report_id ASC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT activity_description, SUM(activity_amount) AS total_amount FROM account_activities WHERE customer_id = 3 GROUP BY activity_description ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT statement_id, statement_date, statement_amount FROM monthly_statements WHERE statement_amount > 500 ORDER BY statement_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM monthly_statements JOIN customers ON monthly_statements.customer_id = customers.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM Customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Customer ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT account_id, account_type, balance FROM Account WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, description FROM Transaction WHERE transaction_date = '2021-10-15';
SELECT report_id, report_date, content FROM Report WHERE customer_id = 2 ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Customer WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT account_id, account_type, balance FROM Account WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, account_id, amount, description FROM Transaction WHERE amount < 0;
SELECT * FROM Statement WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
